name: CADisplayLink
desc: A timer object that allows your app to synchronize its drawing to the refresh rate of the display.

items.name: init(target: Any, selector: Selector)
items.desc: Creates a display link with the target and selector you specify.

items.name: func add(to: RunLoop, forMode: RunLoop.Mode)
items.desc: Registers the display link with a run loop.

items.name: func remove(from: RunLoop, forMode: RunLoop.Mode)
items.desc: Removes the display link from the run loop for the given mode.

items.name: func invalidate()
items.desc: Removes the display link from all run loop modes.

items.name: var duration: CFTimeInterval
items.desc: The time interval between screen refresh updates.

items.name: var isPaused: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the system suspends the display linkâ€™s notifications to the target.

items.name: var timestamp: CFTimeInterval
items.desc: The time interval that represents when the last frame displayed.

items.name: var targetTimestamp: CFTimeInterval
items.desc: The time interval that represents when the next frame displays.
